column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4122_5f5c4b5f92ddfc528b97901da1fdff0334a8ed27/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
The check looks sane; but ideally this validation logic should be in the wallet model, not the click event handler.\n
@aalness, can you move the check to `model->sendCoins`?\n
This needs some love :), as it's rather important IMHO.\n
Looks like the original submitter went AWOL.\n@diapolo Care to rebase this and address the remark?\n
